metadata.purpose: Proof-of-concept image generation to validate approach for Afro-Colombian fisherwoman character
metadata.cultural_note: Scenes reflect Afro-Colombian Pacific coast fishing culture in Tumaco, Narino, Colombia

scenes.title: Sitting Up in Bed
scenes.description: Marina sits up slowly in bed, pushing the white mosquito net aside with one hand. Her black curly hair is loose around her shoulders, sleep-tousled. She wears a light blue cotton nightgown. She reaches for the battery-powered lamp on the wooden nightstand and clicks it on, casting a warm yellow circle of light. The wooden shutters on the window are closed against the night air.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, middle-aged Afro-Colombian woman with dark brown skin, black curly hair loose around shoulders, wearing light blue cotton nightgown, sitting up in bed pushing white mosquito net aside, reaching for battery-powered lamp on wooden nightstand, warm yellow lamp light circle, wooden plank walls, wooden shutters closed, woven mat on floor, pre-dawn darkness, humble wooden bedroom, Tumaco Colombia
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, modern bedroom, luxury, pale skin, straight hair, young woman, bright room

scenes.title: Quick Prayer
scenes.description: Marina stands before the small image of Virgen del Carmen on the wooden wall, her hands pressed together in a brief morning prayer. The lamp light illuminates the framed image of the Virgin holding the Christ child, a small dried palm cross tucked behind the frame. Marina's eyes are closed, her lips moving silently. Her loose curly hair falls past her shoulders over the blue nightgown.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, middle-aged Afro-Colombian woman with dark brown skin, black curly hair loose past shoulders, wearing light blue nightgown, standing before small framed image of Virgen del Carmen on wooden plank wall, hands pressed together in prayer, eyes closed, small dried palm cross behind frame, warm battery lamp glow, pre-dawn morning prayer, devotional moment, humble wooden bedroom
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, modern room, bright lighting, pale skin, young woman, elaborate altar

scenes.title: Wrapping the Headwrap
scenes.description: Back in the bedroom, Marina stands before the small wooden dresser, pulling her curly hair back with both hands. She picks up a bright orange and yellow headwrap (turbante) from one of the hooks on the wall and begins wrapping it around her head with practiced hands, tucking the ends neatly. The mirror on the dresser is small and spotted with age. Several other colorful headwraps hang on the wall hooks.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, middle-aged Afro-Colombian woman with dark brown skin, black curly hair, standing at small wooden dresser wrapping bright orange and yellow headwrap (turbante) around head with practiced hands, small spotted mirror on dresser, several other colorful headwraps hanging on wall hooks, battery lamp glow, getting dressed for fishing, pre-dawn preparation, humble wooden bedroom
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, modern room, pale skin, young woman, straight hair, large mirror

scenes.title: Unwrapping the Headwrap
scenes.description: Marina stands before the small dresser mirror and unwraps her green and gold headwrap, carefully folding it. Her black curly hair springs free, compressed from being wrapped all day. She shakes her head slightly, letting the curls loosen. She hangs the headwrap on its hook on the wall among the collection of colorful wraps. Roberto is already in bed, reading a folded newspaper.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, middle-aged Afro-Colombian woman with dark brown skin, black curly hair springing free, standing at small dresser mirror unwrapping green and gold headwrap, carefully folding fabric, colorful headwraps hanging on wall hooks, man reading newspaper in bed in background, mosquito net visible, evening bedroom scene, warm lamp light, end of day routine
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, modern room, pale skin, young woman, straight hair, bright room

scenes.title: Getting into Bed
scenes.description: Marina pulls back the white sheet and slides into bed beside Roberto. The bed is firm — a simple mattress on a wooden frame. She pulls the sheet up to her chest. Roberto folds the newspaper and places it on the nightstand. He reaches over and squeezes Marina's hand. The mosquito net hangs above them, a white canopy in the lamp light. Marina adjusts her thin, well-worn pillow and settles in.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, middle-aged Afro-Colombian woman with dark brown skin, black curly hair loose, sliding into bed beside husband, pulling white sheet up, simple wooden bed frame, white mosquito net canopy overhead, man folding newspaper, hands touching, battery lamp warm glow on nightstand, thin pillow, humble wooden bedroom at night, peaceful bedtime moment
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, modern bedroom, luxury bedding, pale skin, young couple, suggestive, inappropriate

scenes.title: At the Bathroom Sink
scenes.description: Marina sets the battery lamp on a small wooden shelf and stands before the concrete sink in the simple bathroom. She turns the single faucet — water trickles from the roof tank. She splashes cold water on her face with both hands, the water dripping from her chin. A small mirror on the wall reflects her sleepy face. A bar of white soap sits on the sink edge.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, middle-aged Afro-Colombian woman with dark brown skin, black curly hair in headwrap, splashing cold water on face at concrete bathroom sink, water dripping from chin, small mirror reflecting sleepy face, bar of white soap on sink edge, battery lamp on wooden shelf, corrugated metal shower stall visible behind, wooden floor with drainage gaps, simple bathroom in stilted wooden house, pre-dawn
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, modern bathroom, tile, luxury, pale skin, young woman, bright lighting

scenes.title: Brushing Teeth
scenes.description: Marina brushes her teeth at the concrete sink, leaning forward slightly. Her toothbrush is blue with worn bristles. A tube of toothpaste sits on the shelf beside the lamp. She looks at her reflection in the small mirror — sleepy dark eyes, foam at her mouth. The corrugated metal shower stall is visible behind her. A plastic bucket sits in the corner for water backup.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, middle-aged Afro-Colombian woman with dark brown skin, black curly hair in orange headwrap, brushing teeth with blue toothbrush at concrete sink, white foam around mouth, looking at reflection in small mirror, sleepy dark eyes, toothpaste tube on shelf beside battery lamp, corrugated metal shower stall behind, plastic water bucket in corner, wooden walls, simple bathroom, pre-dawn morning routine
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, modern bathroom, pale skin, young woman, electric toothbrush, bright lighting

scenes.title: Quick Rinse in the Shower
scenes.description: Marina steps behind the corrugated metal shower stall. Water from the roof tank rains down from the shower head — lukewarm from the midday sun heating the tank. She rinses the salt and fish smell from her skin, the water running through the drainage gaps in the wooden floor. A bar of soap on a small shelf lathers in her hands. The shower is quick and efficient — water should be conserved.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, corrugated metal shower stall in simple wooden bathroom, water raining from shower head, steam and water visible above stall walls, bar of soap on small shelf, wooden floor with drainage gaps, water running through gaps, lather visible on hands above stall, natural light through wall gaps, midday after fishing, modest view from outside shower stall, humble bathroom in stilted house
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, nudity, inappropriate, suggestive, modern bathroom, glass shower, tile

scenes.title: Freshening Up for the Meeting
scenes.description: Marina checks her reflection in the small bathroom mirror. She adjusts her green and gold headwrap, tucking a loose strand of curly hair underneath. She washes her hands and face at the concrete sink, patting dry with the towel. She looks presentable — the colorful blue dress, the gold hoop earrings, the good sandals. She is going as a community leader now, not a fisherwoman.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, middle-aged Afro-Colombian woman with dark brown skin checking reflection in small bathroom mirror, adjusting green and gold headwrap tucking curly hair strand, wearing colorful blue dress with yellow flowers, small gold hoop earrings, washing hands at concrete sink, towel nearby, looking presentable and confident, community leader preparing for meeting, natural afternoon light, simple bathroom
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, modern bathroom, pale skin, young woman, casual clothes, fishing gear

scenes.title: Brushing Teeth Before Bed
scenes.description: Marina stands at the concrete bathroom sink, brushing her teeth by the light of the single bare bulb. The mirror reflects her face — tired from the long day but content. She brushes methodically, rinses with water from the faucet, and spits into the sink. She splashes water on her face one last time and pats dry with the towel. The rubber boots sit in the corner, cleaned and ready for tomorrow.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, middle-aged Afro-Colombian woman with dark brown skin, black curly hair in green headwrap, brushing teeth at concrete bathroom sink, single bare bulb overhead, tired but content expression reflected in small mirror, water from faucet, clean rubber boots sitting in corner ready for tomorrow, towel on nail, simple bathroom in wooden house, evening routine, end of long day
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, modern bathroom, pale skin, young woman, bright room, energetic expression

scenes.title: Casting the Net
scenes.description: Marina swings her body and throws the cast net in a wide, circular arc over the water. The net opens into a perfect circle in the air, lead weights pulling the edges down. It hits the water with a soft splash, spreading flat on the surface before sinking. Marina holds the throw line firmly in her right hand, watching the net descend. Sunlight catches the wet nylon strands. The boat drifts slightly with the motion.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, middle-aged Afro-Colombian woman with dark brown skin, orange headwrap under wide-brimmed hat, strong arms throwing cast net in wide circular arc over Pacific Ocean, net opening into perfect circle in air, lead weights pulling edges down, water splash, holding throw line in right hand, sunlight catching wet nylon strands, small wooden fishing boat, bright morning sun, gray-green ocean, dramatic fishing action scene
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, pale skin, young woman, weak arms, modern boat, blue ocean, calm pose

scenes.title: Fish in the Net
scenes.description: Marina swings the heavy net over the gunwale and into the boat. She opens the gathered bottom and fish tumble onto the boat floor — a mix of corvina (sea bass), pargo (red snapper), and smaller sierra (mackerel). The silver and red fish flop and gasp on the wet wooden planks. Marina quickly counts — maybe fifteen good-sized fish. She smiles broadly, laugh lines deepening. A strong first cast.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, middle-aged Afro-Colombian woman with dark brown skin, orange headwrap under wide-brimmed hat, opening cast net full of fish in wooden fishing boat, silver corvina and red pargo tumbling onto wet boat floor, smaller sierra mackerel, fifteen fish flopping on wooden planks, broad smile with laugh lines, strong first catch, morning sun, Pacific Ocean in background, successful fishing moment
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, pale skin, young woman, empty net, modern boat, sad expression

scenes.title: Landing the Big Fish
scenes.description: Marina hauls a large pargo rojo (red snapper) over the gunwale. The fish is beautiful — bright pink-red scales, easily three kilograms. It thrashes powerfully in the boat. Marina grabs it firmly behind the gills with one gloved hand and removes the hook with the other. She holds the fish up briefly, admiring it, sunlight gleaming on its wet scales. This one will fetch a good price at the market.
objects: large pargo rojo (red snapper, pink-red scales)
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, middle-aged Afro-Colombian woman with dark brown skin, orange headwrap under wide-brimmed hat, holding up large beautiful pargo rojo red snapper in fishing boat, bright pink-red scales gleaming in sunlight, three kilograms, blue rubber glove, proud admiring expression, small wooden boat on Pacific Ocean, morning sun, triumphant fishing catch moment, strong fisherwoman
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, pale skin, young woman, small fish, modern boat, sad expression, dead fish

scenes.title: Heading Back to Shore
scenes.description: Marina starts the motor and turns the boat toward shore, the distant line of mangroves growing larger. The boat cuts through the swells, spray flying from the bow. She sits at the stern, hand on the tiller, squinting against the sun's glare on the water. The cooler is full and heavy in the center of the boat. The orange life vest shifts under the bench with the motion.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, middle-aged Afro-Colombian woman with dark brown skin, orange headwrap under wide-brimmed hat, sitting at stern of small wooden fishing boat steering with tiller, motoring toward mangrove-lined shore, boat cutting through swells, spray from bow, full heavy cooler in center of boat, orange life vest under bench, bright mid-morning sun glare on gray-green Pacific water, heading home after successful fishing trip, wide landscape view
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, pale skin, young woman, modern boat, empty boat, blue ocean, calm water

scenes.title: The Dock at Dawn
scenes.description: A wide view of the Tumaco fishing dock at dawn. The sky is painted in bands of pink, orange, and pale gold above the dark Pacific water. Dozens of small wooden boats bob on their mooring lines. Fishermen move along the dock in rubber boots and wide hats, loading gear, calling to each other. Pelicans line the mooring posts like sentries. Marina's silhouette is visible on the dock, her wide-brimmed hat and sturdy frame unmistakable against the glowing horizon.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, wide panoramic view of Tumaco fishing dock at dawn, sky in bands of pink orange and pale gold, dark Pacific water, dozens of small wooden boats bobbing on mooring lines, fishermen in rubber boots and wide hats loading gear, pelicans perched on mooring posts, middle-aged Afro-Colombian woman silhouette with wide-brimmed hat on dock against glowing horizon, beautiful tropical dawn, Colombian Pacific coast fishing village
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, modern marina, yacht, empty dock, blue sky, midday, no boats
